Text: Naval Air Warfare Center Trenton:  It was used as a jet engine test facility for the US Navy until its closure per recommendations of the 1993 Base Closure and Realignment Commission.

<Text: Naval Air Warfare Center Trenton:  The base's Marine operations were transferred to Fort Dix, which has since become Joint Base McGuire-Dix-Lakehurst.>
